Uses of Package
controller

  • Packages that use controller 
    Package Description
    controller  
    controller.hitKing  
    controller.moveHandler  
    view.commands  
  • Classes in controller used by controller 
    Class and Description
    Controller
    A controller that check if the input from the user are valid.
    ICheckChecker
    Class with this interface can check if the king is in check or if position is safe for the king.
    IController
    Classes with this interface can check and do all the action that a user want.
    IFigureHitKingChecker
    Classes with this interface give you for every figure type a HitKingChecker.
    IFigureMoveHandler
    Classes with this interface give you for every figure type a MoveHandler.
    IGameFieldFactory
    Classes with this interface can be create a new game field with the start constellation.
    Move
    This class has the information from which field to which field should be move a figure.
    MoveInPointFigurePairs
    This class has the data on which positions change for a move and it has the information over the next game state.
  • Classes in controller used by controller.hitKing 
    Class and Description
    GameFieldFactory
    This factory create new game fields with the start constellation.
  • Classes in controller used by controller.moveHandler 
    Class and Description
    ICheckChecker
    Class with this interface can check if the king is in check or if position is safe for the king.
    Move
    This class has the information from which field to which field should be move a figure.
